part-1.line-2: One Line of Code at a time.

introduction: Hello there! I'm an engineer living in London.
Proficient in JavaScript and TypeScript, I've built a robust skill-set in web development to create seamless user experiences.

My engineering journey has been uniquely enriched by my Master's degree in computer science, alongside my experiences in both the banking and telecom domains, providing me with a distinctive perspective on real-world challenges.
I relish the opportunity to dive into uncharted territories, always seeking to broaden my knowledge and expand my horizons.
Beyond my love for technology, you'll often find me lost in the pages of a good book. I'm also an avid traveler, and a football enthusiast.

workDone: Maintained seamless web experiences for three bank brands at Lloyds Banking Group, aligning with brand guidelines and user experience principles, serving over 20 million customers.
Reduced website load time by 20% by implementing advanced Webpack configurations, resulting in improved user experience and increased customer satisfaction.
Migrated legacy code to modern frameworks, improving code maintainability and reducing technical debt by 30%.
Trained and educated junior developers on the latest industry trends and best practices, enabling them to enhance their technical skills by 18%.
Contributed to the development and enhancement of a web SDK project to develop responsive web journeys, resulting in a 60% increase in lead delivery time.

Developed and executed a comprehensive plan to seamlessly integrate the bank's core banking system with a new open banking platform, resulting in a 40% increase in customer satisfaction and retention.
Actively involved in migration of Purple Beardâ€™s website from WordPress to ReactJS with TypeScript and Sanity CMS.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve bugs within the codebase, reducing the number of reported issues by 50% within three months.
Educated and developed skills in over 100 students in technologies, such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJS, and Git.
Re-wrote legacy codebase to incorporate React Hooks and replace class-based components, resulting in a 30% increase in code efficiency.
Engineered unit-tests employing Jest and React Testing library for the application, adhering to Test Driven Development (TDD) methodology and increasing test coverage by 5%.
Implemented WCAG 2.0 standards into front-end code, resulting in a 30% increase in website accessibility, measured through a comprehensive user testing process.
Collaborated with a team of 3 developers to practice pair programming and increase efficiency by 15%.

Developed and executed a comprehensive plan to integrate the React Internationalization library into the company's existing frontend framework, allowing for seamless support of French language alongside English.
Raised doubts and sought clarifications via frequent follow up meetings with the Business Analysts and Product Owner, ensuring that all business requirements were captured accurately.

footer.title: This website is built using NextJS
